thread.title: Bil voltade på E45
thread.title_full: Bil voltade på E45

posts.title: Bil voltade på E45
posts.text: Jämtland Bil voltade på E45 En singelolycka ägde rum på E45 mellan Rätan och Ytterhogdal i höjd med avfarten mot Vitvattnet. Två personer har nu förts till sjukhus. Larmet om olyckan kom in strax innan klockan 09 på tisdagen. Enligt initiala uppgifter från polisen har bilen voltat och ligger på taket. Två personer ska vara inblandade i olyckan. Vid 09.30 kom räddningstjänsten fram till platsen. Då befinner sig en person fortfarande i bilen, medan en har kunnat ta sig ut. Flygs med helikopter till sjukhus Enligt inre befäl på räddningstjänsten behövde personen hjälp med att ta sig ur bilen. Båda personerna har nu förts med ambulanshelikopter till Östersunds sjukhus. Vägen stängdes av helt under räddningsarbetet och enligt Trafikverket har olyckan en stor inverkan på trafiken mellan Överhogdal till Rätansbyn i båda riktningarna. Trafiken beräknas rulla på som vanligt igen vid 11-tiden. Bilen kommer bärgas från platsen.

posts.title: Tarihi kılıçlara yeniden hayat veriyor
posts.text:
13:54 Başkan Gülmez’i gururlandıran tablo Tarihi kılıçlara yeniden hayat veriyor - Sivas'taki atölyesinde 35 yıldır bıçak imal eden İsmail Gölebatmaz, eski Türk devletleri ve Osmanlı döneminde savaşlarda kullanılan kılıçların benzerini üretiyor - Gölebatmaz, 2 bin yıl önce Göktürkler'in kullandığı kılıcın da aralarında bulunduğu kama ve hançer gibi silahları, 6-8 ay arasında satışa hazır hale getiriyor - Bıçak ustası Gölebatmaz: - "Osmanlı kılıçlarımıza ve Tük kılıçlarına talep geliyor, sipariş geliyor, yapıyorum. Talep olsun ya da olmasın Göktürk kılıcının bir boy daha büyüğünü yapmayı planlıyorum" 07 Kasım 2017 Salı 10:29 
SİVAS (AA) - Sivaslı bıçak ustası İsmail Gölebatmaz , eski Türk devletleri ve Osmanlı'nın savaşlarda kullandığı kılıçlara yeniden hayat veriyor. 
Eski sanayi sitesindeki atölyesinde 35 yıldır baba mesleği bıçakçılığı sürdüren Gölebatmaz, yıllardır farklı şekillerde ve keskinlikte bıçak üretiyor. 
Gölebatmaz, bıçağın yanı sıra talep üzerine kama, hançer, kılıç gibi Osmanlı, Selçuklu ve eski Türk devletlerinin savaşlarda kullandığı silahları da üreterek satışını yapıyor. 
Son yıllarda özellikle tarihi kılıçlar a yönelen bıçak ustası Gölebatmaz, atölyesinde yaklaşık bir yılda yaptığı 2 bin yıllık Göktürk kılıcı nın benzerini 5 bin liradan satmayı düşünüyor. 
Gölebatmaz, AA muhabirine yapığı açıklamada, bıçak ustalığıyla küçük yaşta tanıştığını ve sanatını babasından öğrendiğini söyledi. 
Daha çok bıçak imal ettiğini ancak bunların yanında kama, hançer, kılıç, isteğe göre de balta yaptığını anlatan Gölebatmaz, "Bu zaman kadar Osmanlı kılıçları yaptım, şimdi de Göktürk ya da Türk kılıcı da denilen kılıcı yaptım. Özellikle Türk kılıcı yapmak istemiştim çünkü çok özelliği bulunan bir kılıç." diye konuştu. 
Gölebatmaz, tarihte kullanılan kılıçları orijinaline uygun yaptığını belirterek, "Özellikle Türk kılıcının heybeti, şekli, duruşu güzel. Çok özelliği bulunan bir kılıç, ben de aslından esinlenerek yaptım. Öncelikle delici bir uca sahip, ince, esnek, sırtı da kalın. Bu, 2 bin yıllık bir model." ifadelerini kullandı. 
- "5 bin liradan satmayı planlıyorum" 
Kılıçları tarih kitaplarından araştırarak yaptığını da dile getiren Gölebatmaz, şunları söyledi: 
"Kışın boş kalırız, kılıç yapımına başlarım. Gün boyu kılıç yapmam ama 6-8 ayda bir kılıcı tamamlarım. İsteyenler oluyor, Osmanlı kılıçlarımıza ve Tük kılıçlarına talep geliyor, sipariş geliyor, yapıyorum. Talep olsun ya da olmasın Göktürk kılıcının bir boy daha büyüğünü yapmayı planlıyorum. Bu kılıcı da 5 bin liradan satmayı planlıyorum." Anahtar Kelimeler:

posts.text:

ESKİŞEHİR (AA) - Eskişehir'de, Fetullahçı Terör Örgütü/Paralel Devlet Yapılanması'na ( FETÖ /PDY) yönelik operasyon da biri meslekten ihraç edilen 4 astsubay gözaltına alındı.

thread.title: Corazón conservado en coñac de Chopin revela causa de su muerte
thread.title_full: Corazón conservado en coñac de Chopin revela causa de su muerte

posts.author: teleSUR - EOS
posts.title: Corazón conservado en coñac de Chopin revela causa de su muerte
posts.text:
Recibe nuestros boletines de noticias directamente en tu bandeja de entrada Ya me he suscrito | No volver a mostrar este mensaje. Boletines Su suscripción fue realizada satisfactoriamente. Científicos determinaron que el famoso músico y compositor Frédéric Chopin falleció por una extraña complicación de la tuberculosis crónica que padecía. 
Un grupo de científicos escudriñó el corazón conservado en coñac del genio musical Frédéric Chopin y descubrieron que fue víctima de una pericarditis. 
Chopin falleció en 1849 a los 39 años de edad por el motivo antes mencionado, una complicación poco usual de la tuberculosis crónica. 
La causa de su lento desgaste y posterior muerte fue objeto de discusiones durante muchos años. Algunas de las opciones que tenían los expertos en mente eran muerte por fibrosis quística, una deficiencia genética de alfa- 1 o el estrechamiento de las válvulas cardíacas. 
via GIPHY 
El gran compositor y pianista polaco tenía un miedo atroz a un entierro prematuro por lo que su deseo fue que le extrajeran el corazón cuando muriera. 
El órgano fue almacenado en un recipiente bañado en coñac, que se encuentra enterrado en la cripta de la iglesia de la Santa Cruz, en Varsovia, Polonia. 
El resto de sus huesos descansan en París, donde también descansan los de Marcel Proust, Oscar Wilde y Jim Morrison, entre otros grandes artistas. 
via GIPHY 
"Desde el estado de su corazón podemos decir con gran probabilidad que Chopin sufría de tuberculosis mientras que la pericarditis por complicaciones fue probablemente la causa inmediata de su muerte", aseguró el líder del equipo de científicos, el profesor Michael Witt. 
"Podría destruir el corazón y en cualquier caso estaría bastante seguro de que ahora sabemos qué mató a Chopin", opinó Witt. 
Este nuevo estudio es el último capítulo en la extraña historia sobre el fallecimiento de Chopin. En primer lugar porque la causa de su fallecimiento fue inexplicable pero también por los hechos que tuvieron que ver con su corazón. 
Al morir Chopin en París, su hermana debió ingresar de manera ilegal el corazón conservado a Polonia y consiguió dejarlo en la iglesia de la Santa Cruz, en Varsovia. 
Sin embargo, durante el levantamiento de Varsovia durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial, un alto cargo de la SS nazi y admirador del pianista decidió conservar el corazón. Una vez finalizada la ocupación el corazón fue devuelto a la iglesia polaca donde permanece hasta la actualidad. Tags

thread.title: 발렌시아가 트리플S 스머프 사이즈TIP
thread.title_full: 발렌시아가 트리플S 스머프 사이즈TIP : 네이버 블로그

posts.author: 임쵸비
posts.title: 발렌시아가 트리플S 스머프 사이즈TIP
posts.text:
구매기 발렌시아가 트리플S 스머프 사이즈TIP 1시간 전 URL 복사 본문 기타 기능 번역보기 http://blog.naver.com/openmaheart/221134688748 드디어 엊그제 센스에서 구매했던 발렌시아가 트리플S가 왔당 :) 멀티 브레드 노초에 이은 마지막 런웨이 컬러였는데 ssense exclusive color라 색도 앞으로 다른 곳에서는 안나올 확률이 높다고! ㅎㅎㅎ 포장은 역시나 센스답게 깔끔하게 왔다. 매치스나 센스나 배송 빠르고 포장 잘하는 걸로는 워낙 유명하니 뭐 :)
배송은 총 3일이 걸렸고, DHL로 왔다. 이번 발렌시아가 트리플S 사이즈는 40으로 결정.
평소 260-265 이지부스트는 270을 신고, 맥퀸 오버솔 40.5 구찌 에이스 스니커즈는 7.5를 신는데 트리플S 사이즈 팁을 주자면 나와 같은 경우 (260-265) 41사이즈를 가는 게 더 좋을 것 같다.
다만 사이즈면에 있어서 아웃솔이 워낙 크게 나와서 다른 동사이즈 신발에 비해 왕발크리가 너무 커서 정말 딱! 맞아서 착화감은 구리지만 외형상을 위해 난 40사이즈로 구매했다.
여태 구매한 구찌 스니커즈나 맥퀸 오버솔 발렌 히든 스니커즈 등 매장 구매를 하면서나 직구를 하면서나 단 한번도 여분 끈을 받아본 적이 없는데(아, 생로랑 서프 스니커즈 빼고!) 이번 발렌시아가 트리플s는 여분 끈이 들어있다.
전체적으로 빈티지워싱이 들어간 파노 컬러로 해외에서나 국내에서나 스머프라고 불리는 듯 ㅎㅎㅎ 색조합과 잘 어울리는 별명이라는 생각이 들었다. :)
구매가는 약 98만원정도. 멀티컬러가 170선 노초와 브레드가 160선. 무채색상이 130-140에 거래된다는 점을 감안해볼 때 리셀가에 비해 확실히 잘 구매한 것 같고 더군다나 센스 한정모델이라 더더 마음에 든다 ㅎㅎ
파란빛이 사진보다 훨씬 선명하고 강하게 도는데 사진상 잘 표현이 안되는 것 같다 :)
개인적으로 노란색과 파란색은 좋아하는 색상 중 하나인데 반전색임과 동시에 시원시원해서 ㅎㅎㅎ보면 볼수록 마음에 든다!
코디는 이런 식으로 베트멍 유로후드나 후에 또 구매하게 된다면 이번 발렌시아가 17ss 웨이브 후드티 블루색상과 매칭시킬 것 같다 ㅎㅎㅎ 여담이지만 개인적으로 이번 웨이브 티셔츠 블루색상의 경우 블랙보다 원단이 너무 엘라감이 강하고 쫀쫀해서 팔아버렸당 ㅎㅎㅎ 몸에 너무 휘감겨서...ㅎ; 근데 괜히판듯 핳
받자마자 바로 미스터멀티로 향했다 밑창보강을 위해서! 구찌 플레임의 경우 그냥 신다가 최근에 와서야 슈구칠해서 신는 중인데 얘는 쪼금 더 아껴주기위해 ㅎㅎㅎ밑창보강을 하러 3413번을 타고 몽촌토성역으로~~~
오랜만의 방문이었는데 ㅋㅋㅋ 예전보다 더 붐비는듯... 지방에서 온 걸로 보이는 택배상자가 즐비했다. 발렌시아가 트리플S 모델 중에서도 이 스머프 파노 모델은 처음 보신다고 막 신기해시길래 ㅋㅋㅋ뻘쭘...
다른 신발과 다르게 아웃솔이 특이해서 6조각의 판을 짜야하고 창은 타 스니커즈와 다르게 비브람솔만 가능하다고 하셨다. 가격은 5만5천원.
예전 기억을 살려보면 원래 3시간 안쪽으로 가능해서 맡겨놓고 잠실역에 갔다오곤 했었는데 일감이 많아진 탓인지 이번의 경우 최장 10일(그러니까 약 4일정도)까지 걸릴 수 있다고 하셨당. 흐 빨리 신고싶당~~~ 태호 전시회에는 요거 신고 유로후드 입고가야지 ㅎㅎㅎ 신난당 히히

posts.author: Angelika (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Выберите карту Таро, и мы расскажем, что вас ждет в будущем
posts.text:
Какая карта привлекает вас больше? Выберите одну и узнайте, что произойдет в будущем.  

Если вы выбрали... 

1. Появляются новые перспективы.   Для вас этот месяц будет полон новых и интересных начинаний. За последние несколько месяцев повседневная жизнь заставила вас немного побеспокоиться. Но новые вещи появятся, и вы будете процветать! Готовьтесь к новостям. 
2. Удача над невзгодами.   Для вас этот месяц будет полон победы и удачи. Вы  столкнулись со многими проблемами, но вы не сдались. Ваша удача не за горами.  

3. Теперь можно открыть запертые двери.  Для вас этот месяц принесет столь необходимый прорыв. Вы много работали над чем-то, но дверь пока не открывалась. Теперь, наконец, время настало. Вы, наконец, получите то, что вам так хотелось! 
4. Долгое путешествие принесет награды.  Для вас этот месяц будет полон наград. Вы долго пробовали, и вам казалось, что результата н будет. Но в этом месяце вы пожнете то, что вы посеяли!

posts.title: (USA-MI-Ann Arbor) Mktg Communications Sr Supr
posts.text:
University of Michigan Mktg Communications Sr Supr in Ann Arbor , Michigan 
How to Apply 
A cover letter is required for consideration for this position and should be attached as the first page of your resume. The cover letter should address your specific interest in the position and outline skills and experience that directly relate to this position. 
Job Summary 
MCIRCC Overview 
The U-M Center for Integrative Research in Critical Care (MCIRCC) is one of the world’s first comprehensive research enterprises devoted to transforming critical care medicine by accelerating science and moving it from bench to bedside. To do this, MCIRCC brings together integrative teams comprised of world-class U-M scientists, clinicians, and engineers with industry partners and funding sources to develop and deploy cutting-edge solutions that elevate the care, outcomes, and quality of life of critically ill and injured patients and their families. 
MCIRCC Marketing Communications Director Role Description 
The MCIRCCMarketing Communications Director is a cross-functional team player who effectively bridges the gap between leadership, creative, technology, research and other service unitsto develop and execute the Center’s strategic marketing plan specific to member engagement, industry engagement, donor stewardship, and marketing operations. The Marketing Communications DirectorCommunicates the Center’s vision and mission to the aforementioned internal and external audiences and serves as MCIRCC’sliaison with fellow marketers and communicators and othercollaborating campus organizations at U-M/Michigan Medicine. 
Responsibilities* 
Plans, coordinates, and executes multichannel marketing communication programs and tactics for internal membership, external donors and industry partnerships: 
Develops messaging platforms, marketing campaigns, and communication strategies. 
Leads the development of compelling content and campaign assets (emails, newsletters, website, Intranet, videos, presentations, collateral, case studies, white papers, etc.). 
Executes strategic messaging consistently, effectively and efficiently across all communication channels. 
Works with Michigan Medicine and U-M Office of Development to create and execute MCIRCC Development communications. 
Continually builds, measure and improves communications and delivery based on customer response, feedback and lessons learned. 
Plans, coordinates and leads event programming including networking mixers, advisory council meetings, symposiums, presentations, tradeshows, educational programs, and others: 
Responsible for concept, budget, promotion and post-event closeout activities. 
Works with Michigan Medicine and U-M Office of Development to create, plan and execute MCIRCC donor/development events. 
Continually builds, measures and improves event programming based on customer feedback and lessons learned. 
Develops annual marketing plan and budget to support strategic initiatives. Provides financial and operational oversight in achieving marketing and communication objectives. 
Supports the MCIRCC membership model, delivering high value communication and marketing support to the MCIRCC research community. 
Develops and manages engagement programs with emphasis on the customer experience. 
Expands and cultivates MCIRCC membership across U-M schools and colleges. 
Responsible for strategic planning and project management for large-scale project implementations from concept to launch. 
Stay abreast of market and industry trends and leverage in conjunction with relevant data sources and internal feedback mechanisms to hone programs and core messaging, align business goals, and better serve customers. 
Responsible for the management and cultivation of MCIRCC’s brand identity (logos, imagery, taglines, and other brand attributes). 
Oversees the production of all printed collateral, print advertising, digital marketing, event marketing, themed marketing programs and campaigns. 
Day-to-day leadership, mentoring and training of team members including, but not limited to, marketing coordinators/assistants, temporary employees, and work study students. 
Manages independent contractors, consultants, suppliers and vendors related to marketing and communication projects to extend team reach and fulfill goals and objectives. 
Develops and maintains standard operating procedures and guidelines, systems, and best practices specific to marketing operations. 
Conducts market research and competitive analyses reports; may include established and prospective customers, collaborators, industry partners, donors, and competitors. 
Independently interacts with collaborating campus organizations. 
Required Qualifications* 
The MCIRCC Marketing Communications Director must have a bachelor’s degree in marketing, communications or related field and/or equivalent experience with a minimum of 5 years of progressive marketing experience that emphasizes strategy development, integrated marketing communications and operational support. Potential candidates must also have a thorough understanding of Internet applications and technologies, and experience interfacing with all levels of teammates/leaders across an organization. 
Desired Qualifications* 
In additional to the above requirements, candidates should also possess the following: 
Experience must demonstrate creativity and familiarity with a variety of marketing concepts, practices, and procedures. 
Demonstrable ability to translate complex technical ideas into accessible and compelling communications to non-specialists. 
Experience with digital email marketing programs such as Constant Contact or MailChimp. 
Experience with content management systems. 
Experience with Adobe Creative Suite. 
Must have strong verbal and written communication skills and be customer service focused. 
Excellent project management and multi-tasking skills, with the ability to prioritize in a fast-paced environment while maintaining attention to detail. 
Ability to work well under the pressure of deadlines and changing priorities. 
Ability to maintain confidentiality while working with highly sensitive information and use excellent judgment on a variety of sensitive subjects. 
Background Screening 
Michigan Medicine conducts background screening and pre-employment drug testing on job candidates upon acceptance of a contingent job offer and may use a third party administrator to conduct background screenings. Background screenings are performed in compliance with the Fair Credit Report Act. 
Mission Statement 
Michigan Medicine improves the health of patients, populations and communities through excellence in education, patient care, community service, research and technology development, and through leadership activities in Michigan, nationally and internationally. Our mission is guided by our Strategic Principles and has three critical components; patient care, education and research that together enhance our contribution to society. 
Application Deadline 
Job openings are posted for a minimum of seven calendar days. This job may be removed from posting boards and filled anytime after the minimum posting period has ended. 
U-M EEO/AA Statement 
The University of Michigan is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. 
Job Detail

posts.author: All New ! Fresh! Crispy! (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: This Just In - LitCrawl 2017
posts.text:
Coffee, books and crawling 
Come down to the Pop Up! View this email in your browser ( http://mailchi.mp/0bc81e77c2fd/litcrawl-programme-launch-1851873?e=7b675f4986 ) The LitCrawl Pop Up is open Monday 6 November 
Thanks to Te Auaha ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=e97b14ea66&e=7b675f4986 ) we have a bright yellow container venue from 6 - 12 November. It’s situated in the idyllic surrounds of Jack Ilott Green ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=c9508dac41&e=7b675f4986 ) , just off Civic Square. There you’ll find grassy slopes, serenity, Vic Books, Coffee Supreme, LitCrawl maps, a piece of public art that seems to be about rugby, and many happening free things! So make sure you come on down and visit. It's open at 10am daily and has a special event each day. - On Monday 6 November at 12.30pm, come and hear Pip Adam talk with artist Kerry Ann Lee ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=587eb13f97&e=7b675f4986 ) for a live edition of Pip's bloody brilliant podcast, Better Off Read ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=eabb452a94&e=7b675f4986 ) . - On Tuesday 7 November come for a lunchtime concert at 12.30pm with award-winning writer and cellist Sebastian Morgan-Lynch ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=7de02b1d7f&e=7b675f4986 ) . 
Full Pop Up venue information on the website here ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=78cd3ca7f1&e=7b675f4986 ) and on Facebook here ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=4e98c6f979&e=7b675f4986 ) . 
Image: Our awesome designer is Minson Design ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=ffbb60af18&e=7b675f4986 ) . You can take this image and turn it into your profile pic for full immersion. Crumpet is one of our beautiful new Wellingtonian crawl venues. Nestled beside the Opera House on Manners street it is a classy oasis of cabaret seating, a comfy wooden bar and dapper waiters who know a thing or two about a thing or two about cocktails. Crumpet is host of the crawl session A Cocktail With LaQuisha ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=6ef7b752a9&e=7b675f4986 )  at 6pm on Sat 11 Nov, in which performance artist LaQuisha St RedFern will interview award-winning playwright Victor Rodger about his life and work. Crumpet have designed cocktails to commemorate the occasion: The Victor - Scotch, Averna, Strega, Pedro Ximenez Sherry. Stirred down and served up. This cocktail has length and complexity, just when you think you've got it there may be another string to his bow. LaQuisha - White & Spiced Rum, Falernum, Lime and rhubarb compote. Sizzled and topped with sparkling. This drink come at you with fearlessness and fun. 
Read more about Crumpet on our Blog here ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=093c767ee1&e=7b675f4986 ) . Just a few more sleeps until we're crawling and extending... We start the LitCrawl weekend on Friday 10 November with Women of Letters (SOLD OUT) before we plunge into a weekend of LitCrawl Extended ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=6c01f845cc&e=7b675f4986 ) starting 11am on Saturday 11 November at City Gallery Wellington. The first session off the ranks is First Novels ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=0bec6c99b8&e=7b675f4986 ) with the brilliant Pip Adam talking to terrifyingly talented debut novelists Annaleese Jochems and Harriet McKnight. Next up is Witi Ihimaera and Hēmi Kelly talking with Michalia Arathimos about their groundbreaking book Sleeps Standing ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=cfb4805270&e=7b675f4986 ) . And in the afternoon we talk Nuns, Angels, Witches & Sluts ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=c551bf3f90&e=7b675f4986 ) before welcoming Northern Irish writer Jan Carson ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=7c33c1c67c&e=7b675f4986 ) who will be discussing her very productive remedy for writer's block, Liam Neeson, her work with dementia patients, Belfast and more. 
Tickets to LitCraw Extended events are available online ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=69a49b5f09&e=7b675f4986 ) and on the door at City Gallery. LitCrawl Extended is your chance to indulge in stimulating conversation with writers from Aotearoa and around the world. There is a Saturday and a Sunday programme. All information is here. ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=d0b68a2e2f&e=7b675f4986 ) 
How do you crawl? There are 25 events to choose from and in our humble opinion they're all spectacular! We'd love to hear what you're planning to go to. Send us a tweet @tweetlitcrawl ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=999bcff4ca&e=7b675f4986 ) and let us know which crawl path you're going to take! #WLGLitCrawl 
If you need a refresher on what's on offer, see the full crawl line up here ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=8dc92518f7&e=7b675f4986 ) . All crawl sessions are entry by donation and all donations go straight into the running of the event and enables us to contemplate preparing another crawl! Become a Supporter! Every year we build up LitCrawl from the ground up. Because we are an accessible event we rely on public donations and grants to keep afloat. If you like what we're making then take a look at the very simple Press Patrondonation page on our website ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=819f2d4956&e=7b675f4986 ) . Press Patron was set up to support great content. It's a super simple way to offer ongoing support for the arts. Every dollar goes into the event and providing a platform for writers in New Zealand. https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=3a24ac8e63&e=7b675f4986 Facebook ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=ebb8353846&e=7b675f4986 ) https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=c38eb797b3&e=7b675f4986 Twitter ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=5ee0d95946&e=7b675f4986 ) https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=5d9b64b8bb&e=7b675f4986 Website ( https://litcrawl.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=8a37e94732eb221549e97a073&id=60ddee8500&e=7b675f4986 )

posts.title: (USA-MI-Ann Arbor) FOOD SVC WORKER II
posts.text:
University of Michigan FOOD SVC WORKER II in Ann Arbor , Michigan 
How to Apply 
A resume is required for consideration for this position. Applications submitted without a resume will not be considered. 
Job Summary 
The leaders and best in food service have an opportunity available for a Food Service Worker II to join our team. Food Service Personnel are expected to provide world class customer service to UMHS patients, visitors and their coworkers while maintaining the highest quality standards for food safety and sanitation. 
Responsibilities* 
Assemble and deliver meal trays following procedures for: suicide precautions, insulin orders, calorie counts, isolation precautions, special diets, allergy cross contamination, and recognize the medical implication for procedure non-compliance. Requires continuous standing through shift, repetitive hand motions, and grasping of items on trays. 
Deliver meal trays following procedures for: The Joint Commission requirement for utilizing two patient identifiers, proper hand hygiene procedures that include standard precautions and following Infection Prevention procedures for wearing protective equipment, as well as service excellence and recovery standards. Operate department provided iPads and cell phones to facilitate safe delivery and meal tray tracking. Requires continuous walking and pushing heavy carts. 
Perform tray retrieval using Infection Prevention protocol and universal precautions to reduce the spread of bloodborne pathogens, wearing personal protective equipment, and following proper ergonomic standards. 
Professionally communicate with Nursing and unit personnel, co-workers and the Manager on Duty. 
Follow standard recipes for portion control, follow ServSafe food safety procedures, and operate food service equipment safely. 
Follow serviceware and equipment sanitation standards in accordance with health code regulations, including proper use of chemicals. 
Utilize the CBORD application Food Management System for food production, Nutrition Services Suite for tray assembly, TrayMonitor module for tray delivery, and Tray Pick-up for tray retrieval. 
Work in an efficient and organized manner to successfully complete job duties within allotted time. 
Understand and practice safe food handling procedures. 
These positions require frequent bending, twisting, squatting and reaching. 
Required Qualifications* 
Read, comprehend and follow written instructions 
Critically think and problem solve independently 
Communicate effectively and speak, write and comprehend English 
Work independently with minimal guidance as well as to work well with others as part of a team 
Perform physical job duties safely, including, pulling, standing, bending, kneeling and lifting up to 35 pounds, walking up to 5 miles per day. 
Perform excellent customer service with a friendly demeanor 
Be flexible with work schedules, job tasks, and job changes 
Maintain appropriate personal hygiene and professional appearance 
Maintain excellent attendance record 
Operate basic IT equipment (ex. iPad, computer) 
Must have High School Diploma or GED, and a willingness to learn new processes and technologies 
Work Schedule 
This is a 20 hour a week position that serves patient trays and picks up dirty trays when a patient finishes his/her meal. The working hours are: 
Friday-Sunday 4pm-8pm, Monday-Tuesday 4:15pm-8:15pm 
Wednesday and Thursday OFF 
Union Affiliation 
This position is covered under the collective bargaining agreement between the U-M and the AFSCME union, which contains and settles all matters with respect to wages, benefits, hours and other terms and conditions of employment. 
Background Screening 
Michigan Medicine conducts background screening and pre-employment drug testing on job candidates upon acceptance of a contingent job offer and may use a third party administrator to conduct background screenings. Background screenings are performed in compliance with the Fair Credit Report Act. 
Mission Statement 
Michigan Medicine improves the health of patients, populations and communities through excellence in education, patient care, community service, research and technology development, and through leadership activities in Michigan, nationally and internationally. Our mission is guided by our Strategic Principles and has three critical components; patient care, education and research that together enhance our contribution to society. 
U-M EEO/AA Statement 
The University of Michigan is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer.

posts.author: 刘顺杰 国家二级心理咨询师
posts.text: 焦虑症的自我疗法包括以下四个方面：1.积极的自我暗示：积极地自我暗示，可以增加自信，克服焦虑。自信是治愈神经性焦虑的必要前提；2.适量的运动：跑步、打球或者游泳可使精神放松，心情愉悦；3.做最感兴趣的事情：当面临焦虑时，放下手头的工作，做一些感兴趣的事情；4.情感宣泄：情感宣泄是缓解压力、保持心理平衡的重要手段。
